WorkItem.ClosedComment:
Hi Phillip,

As of Prism v4, there are no issues with the Prism.Silverlight.Tests project (which is where the Composite.Silverlight.Tests tests are located now).

For previous versions affected by this issue, the fix proposed by the KB article you've mentioned can be used.

Thank you for reporting this.

Guido Leandro Maliandi
http://blogs.southworks.net/gmaliandi
WorkItem.Description: VS complains that it cannot build the Drop 10 CAL Composite.Silverlight.Tests from Source because 'C:\Program Files\Microsoft Silverlight\2.0.31005.0\mscorlib.dll' could not be found. VS cannot find that dll there is a later version of it dll is installed in C:\Program Files\Microsoft Silverlight\2.0.40115.0 on my system. Any help would be appreciated. Thank you.
WorkItem.Summary: Unable to Build the Drop 10 CAL Composite.Silverlight.Tests from Source

Comments.Message:
The PnP team has a fix for this issue. Point your browser to the link below: 

http://www.codeplex.com/CompositeWPF/Wiki/View.aspx?title=Fix%3a%20CAL%20Build%20failure%20with%20Silverlight%20GDR%20update&referringTitle=Known%20Issues%20%2f%20Fixes 

Hope this helps,

Philip
